target.name: New annotation
target.query: select text, test_id from events where "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "test_id" =~ /^$test_id$/ AND $timeFilter

panels.description: Relevant only for the whole test period
panels.title: Total drops, bytes
Max Trex TX Queue length, packets

panels.description: Ratio betwean tx_bw_l7_r and tx_bw_l7_total_r 100% means no retransmition TCP
panels.title: TX bw ratio
Client TCP sessions state per second
Server TCP sessions state per second
Client UDP sessions state per second
Server UDP sessions state per second
ICMP packet rate by NIC port

targets.query: SELECT mean("latency_stats_m_jitter") FROM "trex_tests_latency" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "test_id" =~ /^$test_id$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT mean(/latency_stats_(.*)/) FROM "trex_tests_latency" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "test_id" =~ /^$test_id$/ AND "port" =~ /^$nic_port$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "port" fill(none)
SELECT mean("latency_stats_m_jitter") FROM "trex_tests_latency" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "test_id" =~ /^$test_id$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Client <==> Server. Errors and TCP stack counters

SELECT "profile_name", "profile_path", "profile_client_udps_keepdrops" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "test_id" =~ /^$test_id$/ AND "profile" != 'main_profile') AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM $measurement WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Trex hostname
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM $measurement WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM $measurement WITH KEY = "test_id" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/
list.label: test
list.name: test_id
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM $measurement WITH KEY = "test_id" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "trex_tests_latency" WITH KEY = "port" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "test_id" =~ /^$test_id$/
list.label: NIC port
list.name: nic_port
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "trex_tests_latency" WITH KEY = "port" WHERE "host" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "test_id" =~ /^$test_id$/
